articles.author: Alex Stedman
articles.title: Todd Howard on Other Bethesda Adaptations After Fallout: 'I'll Probably Say No,' but 'You Never Know' - IGN
articles.description: As Fallout premieres, Todd Howard weighs in on the chances of other Bethesda properties getting adapted: "Everybody asks, like, about Elder Scrolls, and I keep saying no."
articles.content: As video game adaptations continue to ramp up in recent years, Bethesda Game Studios is finally getting its first with Fallout, Prime Video's high-profile TV series that debuted last night. And, unsu… [+4382 chars]

articles.author: Universe Today
articles.title: NASA Spots Surfboard-Shaped Object Speeding Past The Moon - ScienceAlert
articles.description: In 2009, NASA launched the Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter (LRO.) Its ongoing mission is to map the lunar surface in detail, locating potential landing sites, resources, and interesting features like lava tubes.

articles.title: Peter Higgs, daddy of the Higgs boson, dies at 94 - The Register
articles.description: The particle bearing his name lives on
articles.content: Obituary In a world dominated by instant gratification, Peter Higgs, who died earlier this week, had to wait more than half of his 94-year lifetime to see his theoretical predictions confirmed, there… [+3358 chars]
